name: dataloader-sequelize
description: Batching and simplification of Sequelize with facebook/dataloader

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:v3 && npm run test:v4 && npm run test:v5 && npm run test:latest
scripts.test:current: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:current:raw: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration:raw
scripts.test:integration: docker-compose run --rm -e NODE_ENV=test dev npm run test:integration:raw
scripts.test:v3: npm install sequelize@3 && npm run test:current
scripts.test:v3:raw: npm install sequelize@3 && npm run test:current:raw
scripts.test:latest: npm install sequelize@latest && npm run test:current
scripts.test:latest:raw: npm install sequelize@latest && npm run test:current:raw
scripts.test:v5: npm install sequelize@5 && npm run test:current
scripts.test:v5:raw: npm install sequelize@5 && npm run test:current:raw
scripts.test:v4: npm install sequelize@4 && npm run test:current
scripts.test:v4:raw: npm install sequelize@4 && npm run test:current:raw
